name: bonita-web-api
description: Open API Specification for Bonita Platform.

scripts.yaml: copyfiles -u 2 docs/images/* dist/bonita-openapi-$npm_package_version/images/ && redocly bundle openapi/openapi.yaml -o dist/openapi.yaml -f
scripts.static: redocly build-docs ./dist/openapi.yaml -t docs/index.html.hbs --templateOptions.version "$npm_package_version" -o ./dist/bonita-openapi-$npm_package_version/index.html && copyfiles -u 1 dist/openapi.yaml dist/bonita-openapi-$npm_package_version && copyfiles -u 1 dist/postman.json dist/bonita-openapi-$npm_package_version
scripts.package: npm run clean && npm run test && npm run yaml && npm run postman && npm run static && cd dist/bonita-openapi-$npm_package_version && zip -r ../bonita-openapi-$npm_package_version.zip *
